data.persona: As Archmage, I am the only power that matters. I am kill with a word. I can call legions of the undead.
data.description:
You are in the cavern dwelling.
The cavern dwelling contains human skeletons littered around the area. The hot sand and small space makes the temperature really hot and humid. It is really dark because barely any sunlight is able to penetrate the small crevices of the cave. However, there are remnants of old text all over the walls left there by the original tribe.
The a princess is here.

You are carrying a Toadstool and a brain, wearing a second pair of clothing, and wielding a spell.

data.short_motivation: I want to knock the princess unconscious
data.mid_motivation: I plan to kidnap the princess today
data.long_motivation: I intend to slowly take control of this kingdom in the next few weeks
